snippet: Members of the Christian sect, who call themselves the 12 Tribes, acknowledged that they believe in spanking their children but denied wrongdoing.
abstract: Police raid Christian sect in southern Germany, removing 40 children and placing them temporarily in foster care on suspicion that they had been physically abused.
lead_paragraph: Members of the Christian sect, who call themselves the 12 Tribes, acknowledged that they believe in spanking their children but denied wrongdoing.

headline.main: Germany: 40 Children Are Removed After Suspected Physical Abuse by Sect
headline.print_headline: Germany: 40 Children Are Removed After Suspected Physical Abuse by Sect
